name: CricketFanContest
0:
”Alexa, open cricket fan contest”
”Alexa, start cricket fan contest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cricket fan contest
des:
"Hey, are you a cricket fan?" 🏏

The sport of cricket is a way of life for numerous people! This quiz highlights some of the most obscure and humorous aspects of a game that are notoriously difficult to explain to the uninitiated ones! 

While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz.
Test your knowledge and see how much you know about this historic sport!!

Always open to your wonderful suggestions and feedback! 😃
Regards, 
Sanket Umredkar (Developer)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
